title: Lost a Hextech Key and Chest
body:
Basically:
- Played a game of ARAM and got a third key fragment
- Proceeded to Crafted a key
- Opened a hex-tech chest
- Chest opening animation plays then fades to black (no loot was received)

I've restarted my client 3 times (still no success)

replies.body: Did you resolve this problem? the same thing just happened to me

Even if you weren't able to see the loot pop up animation, you should be able to find the item it gave you tucked away in your crafting inventory. 

If you think the system may not have given you any loot, reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Our support agents will be more than happy to help find that loot!
